short_summary: Doxycycline Hyclate tablets or capsules of 100 mg for treatment of Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) members.
description: The Contract is for the supply of 259,200 tablets or capsules of Doxycycline Hyclate (100 mg) within the next 2 years, with optional additional requirements up to 31 March 2026.
tags: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement
full_summary:
### Doxycycline Hyclate Tablets or Capsules for the Canadian Armed Forces #

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a supplier to provide Doxycycline Hyclate tablets or capsules of 100 mg for the treatment of Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) members who may have been exposed to bacterial biological warfare agents.

### Tender Details

* Tender Reference: PW-22-01005572
* Solicitation Number: W6369-23-A056
* Amended Request for Proposal: Yes (Amendment Number 1)
* Expected Duration: 31 March 2026 (inclusive)
* Contract Start Date: Not specified
* Contract End Date: Not specified

### Key Requirements

* The initial requirement is to supply 259,200 tablets or capsules of Doxycycline Hyclate (100 mg) no later than 31 March 2023.
* Optional requirements include supplying up to 259,200 tablets or capsules of Doxycycline (100 mg) no later than 31 March 2024, 31 March 2025, or 31 March 2026.

### Trade Agreements

The DND has indicated that this tender is open to suppliers who have agreements under the following:

* Canada-United Kingdom Trade Continuity Agreement (C-UK TCA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement (CHFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Other agreements listed below.

### Tender Status

This tender has expired. 

### Contact Information

Marie-Diane Payeur, Payeur, Department of National Defence, can be contacted at:

* Phone: 819-939-8469
* Email: Marie-Diane.Payeur@forces.gc.ca
* Address: 105 Hotel de Ville, Gatineau, QC, Canada K1O 0K2

### Document Attachments
